Chicago, IL

Hi, I'm Florence. I’m a recent graduate of Art History and Journalism from Northwestern University. I’m interested in new media art, design, digital aesthetics and typefaces.

Previously:

    Art Director, Northwestern Undergraduate Research Journal
    Docent, Mary Leigh Block Museum of Art
    Research Assistant, Delta Lab
    Teaching Assistant, Media Design, Medill School of Journalism
    Brand Design and Content Strategy Intern, Zendesk
    Editorial Intern, Letterform Archive
    Graphics Intern, Business Insider
    Design Intern, Glantz Design
    Art Intern, Redbook Magazine

Currently:
